titles.title: Jesus, the very thought of Thee

properties.verseOrder: v1 v2 v3 v4 v5 v6 v7

verse.name: v1
v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Nor voice can sing, nor heart can frame, Nor can the memory find A sweeter sound than Thy blest Name, O Savior of mankind!{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}O Hope of every contrite heart, O Joy of all the meek, To those who fall, how kind Thou art! How good to those who seek!{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}O Jesus! light of all below! Thou fount of life and fire! Surpassing all the joys we know, And all we can desire.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: {lang-eng}No other source have we but Thee, Soul-thirst to satisfy. Exhaustless spring! the waters free! All other streams are dry.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v7
